A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the most EPIC Star Wars film so far!! The action was nearly non stop. The script was very solid and Finn character finally stopped being the joke of the crew and seriously stepped up and refined his character\, he grew a pair. I’ve noticed lot of haters\, can’t see why. Perhaps because it had some serious body count. Not gory or graphic but let’s just say it was serious stuff but easy enough for the young to watch. Perhaps that was the disappointment in so many people. No gore. Besides that\, it was heavy heavy action.
